text: Hi kids!
Guess who's here
Yes its me bob
Join me for learning street with bob
“Hello Kids! I am Bob the Train, your DJ & Host.
Welcome to our Phonics show
“Our participants in this show are the letters of the alphabet.
Isn’t that cool? They will sing, dance and teach us sounds that start with the letters.
Now, let’s say a big hello and welcome to our wonderful judges”
Are you ready, judges?
Yes Bob!
“Let’s put our hands together for the very kind, Miss K!”

Ka ka ka ka
Is what you say
When you want to meet Miss K.

Hey, what’s that up in the air
Flying around without a care…

Ah it’s a colorful ka ka ka Kite
A ka ka ka ka kite.

Hey, is that a meow we heard?
Who’s that chasing a poor little bird?

Ah it’s a ka ka ka kitten
A ka ka ka kitten.

Hey, its time now for some tea
Let’s heat some water, shall we?

From a ka ka ka kettle 
A ka ka ka kettle

Who is that singing on a tree?
Who do you think that it could be

It’s a ku ku ku ku kookaburra
A ku ku ku kookaburra

Hey, do you know what opens a lock?
And it can also wind a clock?

It’s a ka ka ka ka key
A ka ka ka ka key.

Who goes hop hop hopping there?
Do you think it’s a hare?

No! It’s a ka ka kangaroo
A ka ka kangaroo.

Hey, who is that sitting on a throne?
He is with a queen and not alone

Ah! He is the ka ka ka ka king
The ka ka ka ka king.

Bob and I love being here
Coz all of you are so so dear

We love you, ka ka ka ka kids
We love you, ka ka ka kids.

That’s so true, oh dear Miss K
Kids are happy when they play.

And now judges, what do you say?
Is it three cheers for Miss K?

Fantastic! Knowledgeable ! Awesome
Brilliant!
Thank you Miss K, and Judges.
We will be back soon with the sweet sound of other letters of the alphabet.
Till then Adios !
Hey kids!
Watch the video again and count the number of words
That start with the letter of the alphabet in this episode
Don't forget to put your answers in the comment section below
Thank You!
